metadata.title: CVE-2020-11031 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: In GLPI before version 9.5.0, the encryption algorithm used is insecure.The security of the data encrypted relies on the password used, if a usersets a weak/predictable password, an attacker could decrypt data. This isfixed in version 9.5.0 by using a more secure encryption library. Thelibrary chosen is sodium.

criterions.comment: glpi: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
